attributes.action: Re-visit the biased science that claims CO2 is causing global warming
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There is very good science to support the argument that a warming climate produces the higher CO2, not the reverse. Climate change is always happening; we are not in an unusual state of change. The government should be brave enough to commission a new study. Too many of the current conclusions come from computer models, their results can be manipulated to give any outcome wanted. Think again talk to unbiased scientists.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
